Spacing

Responsive margins and paddings.

Margin

Class Rule 
.margin-auto
 
auto
 
.margin-0
 
0
 
.margin-1
 
$spacer * 0.25
 
.margin-2
 
$spacer * 0.5
 
.margin-3
 
$spacer
 
.margin-4
 
$spacer * 1.5
 
.margin-5
 
$spacer * 2

Padding

Class Rule 
.padding-0
 
0
 
.padding-1
 
$spacer * 0.25
 
.padding-2
 
$spacer * 0.5
 
.padding-3
 
$spacer
 
.padding-4
 
$spacer * 1.5
 
.padding-5
 
$spacer * 2

    .margin-top-1
    .margin-right-1
    .margin-bottom-1
    .margin-left-1

    .margin-negative-1

    .margin-bottom-negative-1
    .margin-left-negative-1

    .padding-right-1
    .padding-bottom-1
    .padding-left-1
